description_html:
Welcome to the future of planning! Dive into efficient and stylish organization with our Digital Planner Collection. Our feature-rich Digital Planner 2024 is crafted for iPad users, seamlessly integrating with GoodNotes for a user-friendly planning experience. Stay ahead of your schedule with the intuitive design and innovative features of our 2024 Digital Planner.

Customization is at your fingertips with our digital planner stickers and templates. Personalize your planner to suit your unique style and make planning a visual delight. Whether you're a monthly, weekly, or daily planner, our versatile digital planners cater to your specific scheduling needs.

Gear up for the years ahead with our forward-thinking 2025 Digital Planner, ensuring you're well-prepared for upcoming goals and milestones. Designed for both iPad and GoodNotes, our planners provide flexibility for your preferred digital platform.

Experience the convenience of a GoodNotes Digital Planner that transforms your planning routine. Download your Digital Planner 2024 instantly and elevate your organization game. Make each day a well-planned success with our digital planners â€“ the perfect blend of functionality and style.

------------------------------------

name: 2025 Digital Planner with Apple Calendar Integration and Event Import
summary: Thank you for your supportâ€”I really appreciate that you found value in my work! :)
description_html:
Introducing the Discover Notes Integrated Series Digital Planner, now available for 2025

Create events, set reminders and alarms, start timers, chat with ChatGPT, and open essential apps like Weather and Files all directly from your PDF planner!

Introducing a breakthrough in synchronisation - import events! With a tap of a button you can view your events and paste it directly into your schedule with it time-blocked perfectly.

Make 2025 yours with a copy of the most advanced digital planner to date - 2025 Digital Planner by Discover Notes.

Take the effectiveness of digital planning to the next level by syncing your planner with Calendar (manually both ways via event import and export) and Reminders to receive those vital notifications to help you stay on track. Take your productivity to the next level with quick access to ChatGPT, set timers and alarms directly from the PDF, and open apps like Mail directly so you never get distracted from leaving the app.

Monday start version included. Sunday start update coming soon.

Hyperlinked/Integrated Features:

  • Apple Reminders
  • Apple Calendar
  • Apple Books
  • Apple Notes
  • Apple Files
  • Apple Mail
  • ChatGPT
  • Weather
  • Clock

Experimental Feature - Import Calendar!

A breakthrough in digital planning - the first of its kind! The action gathers your calendar events for the day, neatly organises it into a notification preview, then organises it by the 24 hour schedule which you can paste into the app! Currently optimised for portrait mode, current day, and one hour non-overlapping events.

Frequently Asked Questions

What devices are compatible?

Compatible with Apple devices. Tested on iPadOS 18 and MacOS 15. Suitable for Goodnotes, Notability, OneNote, Noteful, CollaNote, and Noteshelf (or any other note-taking app that supports hyperlinks!).

How does it work?

The PDF contains hyperlinks that link directly to apps and run a Siri Shortcuts action. This allows you to create events, import items, chat with ChatGPT and open other apps.

Is there student discount available?

Yes! Reach out via email with details about your institution and I'll send you a discount code!

Other questions or issues?

Contact us at discovernotesco@gmail.com or over on X (@discovernotesco) and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

Personal use only. Please note that depending on the app used there may be additional steps. Siri Shortcuts app required.
